verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor גָבַ֣הּ <S%H1361><s%> is not haughty לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> my heart וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor רָמ֣וּ <S%H7311><s%> lofty עֵינַ֑י <S%H5869><s%> nor mine eyes וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor הִלַּ֓כְתִּי ׀ <S%H1980><s%> neither do I exercise בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> myself in great matters וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> or in things too high מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> too

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not שִׁוִּ֨יתִי ׀ <S%H7737><s%> Surely I have behaved וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי <S%H1826><s%> and quieted נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> myself כְּ֭גָמֻל <S%H1580><s%> as a child that is weaned עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> child against אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> of his mother כַּגָּמֻ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> [is] even as a weaned child עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> within נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul

יַחֵ֣ל <S%H3176><s%> hope יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Let Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from henceforth and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever
